ygData.subject: Re: Root? Whirl?
ygData.msgSnippet: The improvement over root is that they cannot attack while it is cast on them. they can t do ANYTHING, in fact. great when grouped with a tank or two, or
ygData.messageBody:
The improvement over root is that they cannot attack while it is cast on them. they can't do ANYTHING, in fact. great when grouped with a tank or two, or simply to help your pet.
-Sloop, Level 12 Human Enchanter
Fennin Ro
----- Original Message -----
From: Bit Net
To: eqenchanters@onelist.com
Sent: Saturday, May 29, 1999 1:42 PM
Subject: [eqenchanters] Root? Whirl?


Bought Whirl last night....

Isn't this just like root?
Didn't even see the NPC spin and wore off faster that Root..

I don't get it, what good is it?


Zahlhedren
Karana
